question: .......................... are the common parts within the 2 and 4 stroke diesel engines.

options: 1) Instead of valve holes, ports are installed

correctAnswer: 5) A cycle is completed in 2 revolution of the crackcase

question: If the flow of water from a centrifugal pump is stopped by closing the discharge valve with the pump running:
options: 2) The water pressure will stabilize at shut off head
3) The water pressure will tend tor ise continuously
4) The driver will be over loaded
5) The water temperature will tend to decrease continuously
correctAnswer: 2) The water pressure will stabilize at shut off head

correctAnswer: 2) Water leak off from the stern tube

question: One horsepower equals ....................

options: 1) Transmit the latent heat of fusion

correctAnswer: 3) Absorb the latent heat of evaporation

question: When distilling salt water the cooling-water discharge from the distiller is fed back to the evaporator as feedwater:
options: 1) To cut down on the amount of cooling water needed
2) To prevent an excess amount of cooling water from being discharged to the bilges
3) To supply hot water to the evaporator for more economical operation
4) To supply sufficient amount of sea water
correctAnswer: 3) To supply hot water to the evaporator for more economical operation
